name: Gorgon Girl
description:
A two-player adventure!

A 2D dual-player local co-op puzzle platformer, where two gorgon sisters must work together to escape the human world, by turning each other into stone and back, to solve puzzles, cross pitfalls and eliminate enemies.

Created by team Gorgonzola at the 2023 Nordic Game Jam.

Controls Keyboard

Movement - Left ← and Right → arrows
Jump - Up ↑ arrow 
Power - Down ↓ arrow

Gamepad

Movement - Joystick
Jump - Buttons
Power - Triggers
